edited_stories.edited_story_text: The road trip was a lot of fun. We packed our suitcases and was ready for the adventure.  We drove to the airport but stopped to take a picture of this cool truck. We arrived at the airport and waited for our flight. It was a long day.  When we got to the hotel, the boys were ready for bed.
